subject: UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT
body:
UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT
Mrs.Lillian Bentley
Executive Director
Address:101 N. Carson Street
Carson City, NV 89701
I am Mrs. Lillian Bentley, from the information Minister of Finance To the UN we write to know if you authorize or sent Mr. Samuel Thomas to claim your funds, on your behalf, did you authorized Mr. Samuel Thomas? if you authorized him, If you have not authorized Mr.Thomas to make claims of your funds kindly provide the details as listed below:
However we shall proceed to issue all payments details to Mr. Samuel Thomas, if we do not hear from you within the next two working days from today. If you have not authorized Mr.Thomas to make claims of your funds kindly provide the details as listed below:
Name:
Address:
Phone:
Scanned Copy of a Government Accredited ID:
Yours Faithfully,
Mrs. Lillian Bentley
Executive Director

subject: Re:   UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I received your message regarding Mr. Samuel Thomas and the authorization to claim funds on my behalf. Could you please provide me with more information about this matter? I want to make sure that everything is in order before proceeding.

Additionally, could you clarify why it is necessary to copy Dr. Handson Richardson and add him on WhatsApp? What role does he play in this process?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Natalie
